text: Ese ntubona ko ibiri mu birere n’ibiri ku isi, izuba, ukwezi, inyenyeri, imisozi, ibiti, ibiremwa byose bigenda ku isi ndetse na benshi mu bantu byubamira Allah? Ariko abenshi (mu bantu batamwubamira) bakwiye ibihano. Kandi uwo Allah yasuzuguje ntawamwubahisha, kuko mu by’ukuri Allah akora ibyo ashaka
